title: Orzo pasta with courgettes, ricotta & pine nuts

ingredients.item: Extra virgin olive oil for drizzling
2 small courgettes, sliced on the diagonal, 5mm thick
1 essential Waitrose Lemon, zest, finely grated, and a squeeze of juice
½ x 25g pack fresh basil essential Waitrose Parmigiano Reggiano, shavings to serve

instructions.step: Cook the orzo pasta in boiling salted water for 7-8 minutes until just tender. Drain and return to the pan with a splash of the cooking water and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil.
Meanwhile, toss the courgettes in the olive oil and season. Heat a griddle pan over a high heat and cook the courgettes for a minute or two each side until tender.
Tip into a serving bowl and add the ricotta, lemon zest and juice and the cooked pasta. Toss well to combine and drizzle with more extra virgin olive oil. Season well.
In a small pan, dry fry the pine nuts over a low heat until lightly golden. Add to the pasta with a handful of fresh basil leaves and serve with shavings of Parmigiano Reggiano.
